rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with ample lighting and floor-to-ceiling windows to let natural light in. Vastu principles suggest placing the entrance in the east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with a modern design featuring floor-to-ceiling windows providing expansive views of the garden. Furniture layout is centered to create an open feel. Vastu suggests placing the main sitting area in the southeast for wealth and abundance.

rooms.name: dining_room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with large windows that overlook the garden. Designed for a family of four with ample seating and decor following Vastu's emphasis on south-east for nourishment.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, designed for efficiency and ease of movement. Includes a breakfast nook facing the north-west according to Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom strategically placed near the kitchen with sufficient natural light while adhering to Vastu's guidelines of water placement in the northeast.

openings.description: The main entrance door aligns with Vastu principles by being placed on the north side to invite prosperity.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed in the living and dining areas to maximize natural light and ventilation, respecting Vastu's emphasis on openings facing the east for health.
